I’ll have to return because I wouldn’t wear the pants out.
I loved the pant suit but it was one size too small.  I got sick with covid and got behind on everything and forgot about sending it back for a larger size.  I guess it is too late now, correct?

With wintertime being right around the corner, this outfit is exactly what I need. The fleece half-zip pullover provides warmth and comfort, making it perfect for chilly days, while the matching jogger sweatpants offer a cozy fit that’s great for lounging or running errands. The stylish design ensures I can look put together even when I’m just relaxing at home. Plus, the fabric feels soft against the skin, making it ideal for layering. This set will definitely keep me warm and comfortable throughout the colder months!

评论概述: I want to like them but...
评论详情: I really want to like these but I can't justify the cost. I find that they fit funny...not small but not large either.just weird. They are decently soft and the color is pretty I guess but they are also not incredibly comfortable. I just find them...weird unfortunately.
This sweatsuit is so nice. It's very thick and comfortable.

Have bought several of these for winter WFH days.  They're very comfy and seem to wash well. Also not a bad value for the money when on sale or there's a coupon box to check. For reference I'm @145 lbs and 5'4 and have already worn this twice.

评论概述: Very Comfy, Be Sure to Size Up
评论详情: Overall, I'm very impressed with this tracksuit/sweatsuit set. (TL;DR)  The set was delivered in a vacuumed-sealed plastic--reminds me of the ziploc bags that have the air vacuumed out--that is resealable. The clothes did not have that off putting smell that often comes with buying clothes via Amazon; only a slight plasticy smell from the bag. As for the set itself, it is comfy and warm without being too heavy. The fleece on the inside is very thin, so I doubt it will do well for "warmth" in freezing temps; however, I'm in the US southeast and it's perfect for my needs. The set held up during a cold, gentle wash cycle and hang dry. The fabric dried overnight; even the cuffs around the wrists and bottom hem of the top dried fairly quickly. The large fit is slightly baggy on me (measurements below). Before getting into the details, my overall first impression is that this is an excellent set that is worth the $45 price tag. I would suggest going up a size for that "roomy" feel.  --Excessively Detailed Review Notes Below--  My measurements are: 5', 145 lbs, 39' bust, 32" waist, 40" hip, and 26" inseam (short and stout), and I requested size large primarily for a roomy waistband and higher rise. The large pant's measures: 10.5" front rise and 16" seat from crotch (sorry, can't find a better word) to the top of the waistband, 34" waistband, 27" inseam, and 45.5" hip. The large top's measures: 24" from shoulder to bottom hem, 43" bust (this measurement was a struggle to get correct with the sleeves), a 41" bottom hem, and 57" arm span.  Detailed Set Fit: The set fits decently. I sized up for the comfier fit, but I feel as though the sizing runs smaller in some areas than the size chart indicates. The manufacturer advices to give or take an inch, but some parts were more like 2 inches different but that could be due to the fleece lining. There is a bit of pooling at the pant cuff, but that's expected for me. The arm span fits me almost perfectly (about an 1"-1.5" over "perfect"), which could lean the top''s arms towards being too short for taller/longer-armed folks. There is minimal shoulder constraint, so I can reach up and across easily but there is slight shoulder compression.  Nurospicy person note: this top does not have a dropped shoulder that allows for more freedom of movement, the slouchy look in the photos appears to be from sizing up rather than the designed. The photos in which the model has their elbows pointing out (looks like the 3rd image for the colors Navy Blue, Brown, and Khaki, and the fourth image for the Red one) shows the pulling/compression on the top of the shoulders. The semi-ish-bat wing keeps the sleeve from compressing the bottom part of the arm or cutting into the armpit. I also noticed that the fleece lining clings to cotton underclothes like underwear and t-shirts, and those spots feel slightly sung. Even though the measurements indicate the piece should be loose, the clinging creates the feeling of snugness. That cling bugs me when I'm overstimulated, but I realize some folks like or don't mind that feeling.

Wash it before you put it on; it irritated my skin, especially the inner thighs, until I washed it. Now it's my favorite set. The pants are a little short (I feel like that's visible even in the photos, now that I know to look)  and the inner thighs started pilling almost immediately, which is why it has 4 stars instead of 5. The color is great and it's large-chest friendly. The torso is a good length and the collar is very cute, actually. I love the whole set.
This sweatshirt set is very comfortable and warm. Fits true to size and the red is very flattering and attractive. Good quality material and perfect for cooler weather.

These are made from your typical sweat pants or hoodie fabric, softer on the inside. The fabric is thicker and warmer for cold nights. Personally I would not wear them traveling since they look and feel like pajamas to me. Maybe for a walk or workout, but not as flexible as I would like for work out clothes. The top is casual, I’d wear it out with jeans to go out and about. My typical medium in The pants and top fit perfectly. The pants elastic waist band is comfortable. I’m 5’ 4” and between an 8 and 10. The thumb holes on the top are placed right and are big enough. The top fits without being baggy nor tight. However, it does not have any stretch to the fabric so feels tight in the arms when I reach forward.

评论概述: Versatile and more flattering than you would think
评论详情: My wife typically wears a small but got this set in medium because she wanted the extra length (she is 5'8.5")  and loose fit. She can wear it long with Uggs, but find this looks better scrunched up on the calf. Although it's loose, it's actually a flattering look because the waist is more fitted and the top has a boxy cut that matches well. The inside fabric is soft and more fleece like than the outside, which has a more durable feel. This is great to throw to run errands in the cooler weather, especially if you need to stop at the gym while you're out.

I really love the beautiful color and style of the sweatshirt top. The raglan sleeves are stylish and comfortable -- love them for ease of movement. The ribbed cuffs have thumbholes -- a blessing if you have cold hands. Love the funnel neck -- when it's zipped up, so warm and cozy, but you can zip it down for ventilation if you get too hot and then you have a nice collar. The kangaroo pocket has a flattering cut. The fabric is substantial and is brushed inside for a fleecy finish. The pants are kind of meh in comparison -- they are basic sweatpants with pockets, and they are pretty long, so they look bulky and baggy. Not stylish, like the top. I wish the cut wasn't so full. I wouldn't wear this ensemble on a plane because it looks too casual for my taste -- the pants I'd wear only around the house or on my way to the gym. The top, however, would make a good travel piece with nicer pants because of the comfortable cut of the armholes and the versatile neckline that looks equally good zipped up for cozy warmth or zipped down for ventilation.

Very comfy, cozy set. Nice quality and I really like the apricot color. I ordered the size medium based on the size cart. I normally wear a number size 6. The medium fits well in the waist. I cant wait for the weather to cool down to wear it

I really liked this outfit. I got the large and the pants were just too big, The top was good little big but okay, the pants just to big. The outfit is very warm, thick materail, good quality. the sizing on the pants was wrong for me.

评论概述: Runs a little big, but is thick and warm.
评论详情: I ordered the navy leisure suit in a Large. I had to return it b/c it did not fit. I am 5’2 and even though there were elastic around the ankles so the legs wouldn't drag, the length was just too long. The sweatshirt was equally large. I did like the navy color, and i was impressed w/ the thickness and quality. It would definitely keep you warm. I liked the zipper at the neck so you didnt have to mess up your hair when you put it on, and the pockets. I gave this 3 stars b/c the sizing was so off. The legs are very long and the sweatshirt was wide. There was not a lot of shape to this leisure suit.

I bought this set mainly for travel but have use it lot at home too. Here's my quick thoughts:  advantages:  material is soft and kinda cozy, feels warm on cooler days. love the little details like thumb holes, make it good for jogging or just relaxing. the pants got pockets, which is super handy when you don't wanna carry bag all the time. top fits nicely with the half-zip, good for those quick temperature changes. cons:  the size is little confusing, I ordered medium but it felt shorter on legs. after 2 washes, fleece looks bit less fluffy, like it lose some of it's softness. pants string keep twisting inside waistband, little bit annoying. Overall, its not bad set. Good choice if you want comfy and casual for travel or lounging. I wear it a lot but not for very long flights, still, kinda recommend!

评论概述: So Warm and Very Nice Quality!
评论详情: I’m obsess with the sweatpants in particular! They are so thick and they are very flattering and comfortable. They’re perfect for the fall season.

评论概述: A must add to your fall and winter wardrobe
评论详情: Excellent quality soft and well made For reference I am 124 pounds 5’5” and I bought a medium.

This set is SO soft and warm! I do not wear sweatsuits out, so wouldn't wear this for errands or traveling, but I am always freezing in the winter and love the feel of this, the softness and the warmth. I know that I will be wearing this around the house a lot this winter for sure!!!  This is well made, the fabric is really nice quality and the softness and warmth can't be beat. I sized up because I wanted some roominess but I wish I had stuck with my regular size, as I didn't really need to size up for a roomy fit.  I am really happy with the construction and comfort of this sweatsuit!

Wife’s review: Super cozy and comfortable! I love twin sets like this for weekend errands when you want to look put-together without going all out. The green color is beautiful, and the material feels high-quality. Perfect for those casual days!
I love this set so much. I get many compliments. The color and quality is unmatched.

I absolutely love everything about this sweatsuit! It’s warm, cozy, and fits perfectly, making it my go-to outfit for the winter. What’s great is that you can easily dress it up with accessories for a day of shopping. The zippered collar and the cut of the fabric elevate it beyond a traditional sweatsuit, adding a touch of style to comfort. I’m 5'6" and 190 pounds, and this outfit fits me wonderfully.

absolutely love the PINSPARK two-piece set! The fleece half-zip pullover is super cozy and warm, perfect for chilly days. I appreciate the stylish design—it’s not just comfortable but also looks great when I head out. The jogger sweatpants fit perfectly and are incredibly soft, making them ideal for lounging or running errands. I often wear this matching set while traveling, as it’s easy to throw on and still looks put together. Plus, the pockets on the pants are a nice touch for keeping my essentials handy. Overall, this outfit is a must-have for anyone looking for a blend of style and comfort!

After reading a review that recommended sizing up, I went with a medium instead of my usual small. The pullover fits nicely, but the jogger sweatpants are a bit looser than I’d like. That said, they’re still comfortable and perfect for lounging around the house. I chose the pink color, which looks just like the photos on Amazon. The material is high quality, and I really love the thumb holes! I suggest sticking with your usual size instead of going up, as it’s not necessary.

This two-piece set is perfect for cozy days at home. The fabric is thick, soft, and comfortable. It washes well with no pilling. While the fleece lining is thin, it's just right for moderate climates. It may not be ideal for extreme cold, but it’s perfect for lounging, running errands, or casual wear. For a comfy, casual set, it's well worth the price, and sizing up will give you that relaxed, roomy feel.

This is definitely a comfy-at-home outfit vs. a chic lounge set, but I don't mind at all.  The fabric is super thick and cozy, and this will definitely keep me warm during the winter months. It came through the wash well, no pilling so far, though I'll keep an eye out since this type of fabric does tend to pill.  The green color is SUPER vibrant and eye-catching; it's usually wear more muted colors but this is a fun change.  The top fits perfectly (I'm 5'6" and 130-140 and got a medium) but it's worth noting that the legs are quite baggy.

This is a comfortable, cozy two-piece jogging set. It is heavyweight and made of soft fabric. It fits true to size, and the green jade color is very pretty. This set is great for wearing all day, running errands, and lounging around on a cold day. This was a great purchase.

评论概述: I absolutely love this two piece set.
评论详情: I absolutely love this two piece set. #1. I'm a pink girl. #2. The fit is amazing.

We’ve been hunting for the perfect pair of simple, classic sweat pants for awhile, and we found them!! The pullover top is super comfortable, warm and cute, but it feels like just a really nice bonus because the sweatpants alone would still be a great value! Sweatpants are so often too thick, too baggy, too long, short, wide legged or slim, full of cargo pockets or adjustable cuffs. It’s so hard to find just a pair of perfect classic fitting gray sweatpants! Thrilled with these. Super soft and comfortable. Highly recommend this set.
This set is very comfy and well made. The pants seem a bit big, but both items wash well. I ordered small NYE top top great, thought I wish the bottoms weren't so baggy. Still love none the less.
So comfortable & cute!!  Fits true to size and I love the pocket options.
Very good quality, and I love it
